desc: MINIWIZ captures the value of single-use plastic, metal, glass, by applying upcycling technology in transforming industrial and household wastes into COVID-19 combating antiviral products, sustainable building materials, modules, specialty fabrics, designer furniture, and interior fixtures.

layout.text: Our phone pouch combines fashion, sustainability, functionality, and antibacterial features. We infuse positively charged silver ions into our proprietary fibers to stop microbes from spreading. This removes bacteria from your phone every time you use it. The pouch is more than a product - it is a better lifestyle choice aiming to keep you healthy.
